name: Spin or Die (itch)
description:
Note: There is a bug that makes it so that you can't skip the "Slot or Die" menu after successfully completing a combat level. This will be fixed after the rating period is over.

Note: In the WEBGL version there is a bug such that the slot machine doesn't function the way it is intended. On a lucky slot machine result the player may sometimes go back a few spaces instead of staying, and on an unlucky slot machine result the player may stay instead of going back a few spaces.

Hello there, You've been tasked to save the princess in this familiar yet oddly suspicious fantasy world. Roll the dice to determine how many steps you shall take. Then choose if you would like to play through the level, or spin the slot machine for a chance to skip the level entirely. Be wary though, if you get an unlucky result on the slot machine you may have to go back a few spaces. When playing through combat levels use WASD/Arrow keys to move and Left Mouse Button to swing your sword. Good luck player.
